logo_image.label: Logo
logo_image.info: Upload an image to replace the default logo. The recommended image size is 450 x 100 pixels.

logo_max_width.label: Logo width
logo_max_width.info: Adjust the width of the logo. The recommended width is 90 pixels.

favicon_image.label: Favicon
favicon_image.info: Upload an image to replace the default favicon. The recommended image size is 32 x 32 pixels.

header_font.label: Font
header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

body_font.label: Font
body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

text.label: Text
text.default: Free shipping on all orders over $50
